Text.Value: You put the stars to shame. Let's sit here another while - I want to drink you in.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: Please - continue to believe in me. I want to show you the wizard I am capable of being, rather than the poor excuse for a man who's kept you company thus far.
You're welcome - but don't put yourself down. You deserve me, and a lot more besides.
Stop his protests with a kiss.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Player and Gale are seated facing each other but do not lean in to kiss.

Text.Value: No doubt it will be - abominably so. As is just about everything we do. But I know we're up to the task. Are you still with me?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: I wouldn't blame you for giving me a wide berth. I thought the orb's ever-present censure had tamed my wilder ambition, but that wasn't the case.
You see me as I am, and do not find me wanting. With these stars as my witness, I swear - you will always be enough for me.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: The Karsite Weave could offer more than just power - it could bestow divinity. If I only trust myself to wield it.
I'll stand by you. But some further explanation of what you intend wouldn't go amiss.
Yes. I want you to seize the crown, and make us a new world.
I love you. But for the man that you are. Not the god you'd pretend to be.
You put the stars to shame. Let's sit here another while - I want to drink you in.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: I hope you're right. I truly do. Godly power, perhaps I can live without, but you? You're everything.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Expression brightening up. Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ChristianD] Player open their eyes, still sitting on the small boat and look around the starfield, taking in the view for a while.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fade up from black as the player opens their eyes to a dazzling spectacle. They and Gale are now sitting in a small boat that shimmers with iridescent light. Unpiloted, it silently meanders through a majestic, infinite starfield.
EditorData.SFXTags: there are in astral plane on a magic boat not if it float on water or just space
EditorData.VFXTags: open eye fade in pov player

Text.Value: They would keep all of this from us - the power, the possibilities. They only want us to serve them, pray to them... and ultimately, die for them.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: So much power will only prove dangerous. You should forget it.
Mystra herself was once mortal. The power would corrupt you, as you believe it corrupted her.
Mystra herself was once mortal. The power would corrupt you, as you believe it corrupted her.
The gods you think so little of were once mortal themselves. The power would corrupt you, as you believe it corrupted them.
This is wrong, Gale. That power will corrupt you, even if you can seize it.
Just what am I agreeing to?
Then it will be so. With you and I together, there's not a force in existence that can stop us.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: Remain steadfast - there is nothing to fear from what awaits me. In fact... allow me to show you. Words alone are not enough.
Stop his protests with a kiss.
You're more to me than magic, Gale.
I owe you an apology. Things became quite heated between us before, after I learned of the Crown of Karsus. I allowed myself to get carried away, and failed to properly explain myself.
You told me once to choose you, the one who loved me. That's what this is all about. Do you doubt me?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale's expression wilts with disappointment. Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.
The remaining stars blink out like snuffed candles, leaving only the faint glow of the boat. Gale and the player sit silently for a moment. The scene fades fully to black.
EditorData.VFXTags: The remaining stars blink out like snuffed candles, leaving only the faint glow of the boat. Gale and the player sit silently for a moment.

Text.Value: I used to believe Mystra's forgiveness was worth dying for. But I was wrong. You showed me just how much I have to live for.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: The power to change the world - it may be within our reach. You must have an opinion, surely.
That's all I ever need to hear.
Close your eyes.
You know how I feel. I've already voiced my support.
You know I would if I could. But I'll sit with you as long as you'll have me.
Tell me you feel the same way. Tell me you want what I want. Please.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: If we can seize it, and use it... the possibilities are endless. Yet you haven't uttered a peep one way or the other about it.
Perhaps now is the time to explain then.

EditorData.stateContext: The player and Gale are seated facing each other (Player facing forward, Gale with his back to the bow, close enough to lean in for a kiss) in a small boat that is 'sailing' through the stars.

Text.Value: A little boat voyage, that's all. Indulge me.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Coy smile
EditorData.NodeContext: A little cheeky/coy. Holding back a surprise he's arranged.

Text.Value: You see me as I am, and do not find me wanting. With these stars as my witness, I swear - you will always be enough for me.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: Few mortals ever glimpse what you're about to see. But don't be alarmed - I'm here with you. Now... open your eyes.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Black screen. Gale speaks in VO

Text.Value: It was easier to stare at the celestial abyss than recognise the emptiness within myself. Easier to pretend my destiny lay among such stars, than work to salvage a life on solid ground. You changed all that.
But I cannot. You would  not be able to either, if you knew what I knew. Please, allow me to show you. Just close your eyes a moment.
You're willing to give up the chance of unlimited power. I'd say your ambition is under control.
I don't need the stars, Gale. I have you.
Ah. You're still talking to me then?
I'm here to support you, no matter what you want.
Kiss him.
The tadpoles, the orb - these threats to our existence - the gods could aid us if they wished, but instead they cower behind Ao. So let us act ourselves.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.
EditorData.NodeContext: Ao = AY-oh (an overlord deity that most gods answer to)

Text.Value: Let's not grow complacent - that path you speak of is sure to be a dangerous one.
Enjoy the rest of your evening.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The boat drifts away amidst the stars.
EditorData.VFXTags: The boat drifts away amidst the stars. wide shot

Text.Value: Apologies are useless if you're still intent on doing something dangerous.
It won't, I swear to you. It's merely a tool - a means to an end.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ChristianD] Gale's body posture changes drastically in dissapoinment from being excited to feel defeated, looking down.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale's shoulders sag. The starfield around seems to dim. Distant points of light vanish into the infinite dark.
EditorData.VFXTags: The starfield around seems to dim. Distant points of light vanish into the infinite dark.

Text.Value: I don't think I deserve you at times. I told you of my ambitions - the likes of which many would baulk at - and yet you remain at my side.
That means there'll be no permanent place in the heavens for us. But we could still visit.
There you are. I was worried you might have second thoughts after my little confrontation with Mystra.
Right now, I need nothing more than a kiss. Then we'll face what is to come, together. And claim the crown when the time comes.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.
The boat drifts away amidst the stars. (No touching)

Text.Value: I needed Mystra's intervention. She offered me a path to redemption at last, and it might yet leave my mind and body intact.
I'm starting to regret our relationship. What am I even getting myself into?
I suppose if you see it that way... there's little else to be said, is there. Enjoy your evening.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Crestfallen expression
EditorData.NodeContext: Quietly devastated after the player rebuffs him.

Text.Value: Words alone are not enough. Permit me to show you. Please, close your eyes a moment.
Ah, you've a moment for me? I was hoping to speak to you - I confess, my thoughts have been somewhat scattered since my audience with Mystra.
Please, close your eyes a moment.
Few mortals ever glimpse what you're about to see. But don't be alarmed - I'm here with you. Now... open your eyes.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Black screen. Gale speaks in VO

Text.Value: I must admit, the Crown of Karsus has occupied my every thought since I learned of it. If I can seize it, and use it... the possibilities for both of us are infinite.

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ChristianD] Player and Gale both lean in to kiss while seated facing each other
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player and Gale lean in to kiss while seated facing each other.

Text.Value: I'll always have you, Karlach.
But think what I offer. The vastness of eternity to explore, the Weave at our fingertips... You would really prefer me as I am?

EditorData.NodeContext: Genuine, vulnerable - the player just told him they loved him in a way that no one else has

EditorData.AnimationTags: [ChristianD] Player open their eyes, still sitting on the small boat and look around the starfield, taking in the view for a while.
EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Fade up from black as the player opens their eyes to a dazzling spectacle. They and Gale are now sitting in a small boat that shimmers with iridescent light. Unpiloted, it silently meanders through a majestic, infinite starfield.

Text.Value: If you believe this can be done, then I will believe too.
This sounds dangerous.
I don't doubt your motivations, but do this, and you will match Karsus' folly with your own.
I've already defied Mystra. Had I followed her command, there'd be nothing left of me but a smoking crater.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: When are we not doing something dangerous? Give me a chance - I think I can help you understand.
I believe in you Gale. Always have, always will.
You're already everything I need you to be.
Answer him with a kiss.
Apology accepted.
It gladdens me to hear you say that. Perhaps I can show my gratitude another way - by demonstrating exactly what ascension will mean to me. To us.
I can't. Your opinion matters greatly to me. Give me a chance - I think I can help you understand.
I know what I must do. The Crown belongs under Mystra's stewardship, not mine, and I will ensure she gets it.
You plan to dethrone the gods themselves - it's lunacy.
How could I not crave this? But I don't want it for myself, alone - I want you at my side, willing and wholehearted.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: But what if we didn't need them? What if we wielded their power instead, and helped ourselves in all the ways they refuse to. I could make that happen. I could make this illusion a reality, with you by my side.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: Yes. I want you to seize the crown, and make us a new world.
No doubt it will be - abominably so. As is just about everything we do. But I know we're up to the task. What do you say...?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: I must admit, the Crown of Karsus has occupied my every thought since we learned of it.
You stole the words from my mouth.
I feel the same. Whatever you need of me, consider it done.
With the power of the crown, any foe would be rendered impotent. Any obstacle would be dwarfed by our might.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: I don't know what to say. How can I respond to something so... immense? It's beyond comprehension.
Close your eyes.
But I could be so much more to you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Crestfallen expression. Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: Enough. If you won't see sense, just take me back.
No, Gale. Whatever you have to show me - I don't need it.

EditorData.stateContext: Player and Gale are in camp, standing in front of each other.

Text.Value: Say yes. But if words fail you, I'll accept a kiss.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: What more is there to be said?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: I'm sorry. It's not easy living for more than just yourself, when for so long just staying alive was accomplishment enough.
I don't know what to say.
No, Gale. I've indulged you enough.
You'd defy Mystra? As if we need more enemies.
I know this may not be the course you would choose for me, but before you protest - you should at least know what it is you would be advising against.
With you, I forget my goddess. I love you.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: As you wish. Take a moment to soak the view. I doubt you will be privy to it again.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: A pity I did not learn all she had to offer, but the fact that she summoned me to her presence is proof enough that the Crown of Karsus is worth pursuing.
Then have me - but have the best possible version of me.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: Then the fault lies with me, and my inadequate words. Please, allow me to show you instead. Just close your eyes a moment.
Quite the view, isn't it? The Outer Planes are a place of profound, sometimes overwhelming possibility.
Nothing. Take me back.
Yes, you have. But I want more than your support. I want your heart.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: I can't, Gale. This is best forgotten. I love you as you are.
Wait. Perhaps I'm being too hasty... and perhaps you're overreaching.
Answer him with a kiss.
Just what am I agreeing to?
You're right. We should not deny ourselves such a gift. The crown must be ours.

EditorData.stateContext: The player and Gale are seated facing each other (Player facing forward, Gale with his back to the bow, close enough to lean in for a kiss) in a small boat that is 'sailing' through the stars.

Text.Value: Say nothing. Answer him with a kiss instead.
You mean... you want the same as I do?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: Say nothing. Answer him with a kiss instead.
No matter. Far be it for me to impose the majesty of the celestial canvas on those unwilling to partake of its beauty.

EditorData.NodeContext: A bit miffed but trying to take it on the chin

Text.Value: This folly is your own - I want nothing to do with it.
I've never wanted to kiss you more than I do now.
Kiss him.
Astra navigabimus.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes and the screen briefly fades to black. Gale speaks over black, casting a spell.
EditorData.NodeContext: Latin spellcasting - ass-tra navi-gah-mus ('we sail the stars')

Text.Value: Are you saying you want to ascend? Claim godhood?
Forget it.
Most would think me foolish, deluded even, for daring to pursue dreams of wielding Karsus' Crown. I do not take your faith lightly.
Yes. I want you to seize the crown, and make us a new world.
You're still determined to do this, after all that was said?
I hope so, because honestly you have been a poor man recently. Especially on the romance front...
Thank you. But I owe you more than that. I need to help you understand just what this could mean for us.
Astra navigabimus.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: The player closes their eyes and the screen briefly fades to black. Gale speaks over black, casting a spell.
EditorData.NodeContext: Latin spellcasting - ass-tra navi-gah-mus ('we sail the stars')
EditorData.VFXTags: eye closing fade to black pov player

Text.Value: No, not like that. I don't want to join them, I want to better them. A god's powers, paired with a mortal conscience, a mortal heart.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: The Outer Planes. This is where gods dwell. Where they observe us from afar. Where they make play-things of us.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gale is sitting in a boat; record on a chair or a bench. Search mocap context for the pose, Greg will post it.

Text.Value: Plenty, in time. This doesn't have to be the end for us - just forget the crown.
I conjured this illusion often during my confinement in Waterdeep. An escape for the mind, where there was none for the body.
If that's true, it's thanks to you, and the trust you show in me at every turn of this strange adventure of ours.

Synopsis: After learning of the Crown of Karsus and the way it means potential ascension, Gale invites the players to share in his potential divinity. He brings them to an illusory part of the Outer planes, where they sail through the stars on a boat.
